page.title: 03Strathmiglo - The Town Hall
page.content: Below this is a block of stone which used to be a sundial on top of the village cross which is said to have been made by the last catholic priest in the village. In the early days stocks were placed beneath the front of the tower.People found guilty of some offence were chained up. At the present time, workmen are in the process of converting the bottom floor of the Town Hall into a dwelling house. The property was purchased by the people living in the adjoining house and there will be a door way linking the two.
